name: Tank vs Targets
description:
Key features:

  • Tanks can fire bullets on click towards targets and move left/right on arrow keys. 
  • Targets (some of them are blinking) can also fire bullet towards tank. 
  • Once all targets are shot, you win. 
  • If targets reaches the bottom base or tank is hit by target bullet, you loose. 
  • Type 'R" to Restart the Game. 
  • When the blinking targets are not visible, bullet will miss the target.
  • When last target is left, speed of that target increases multifold.
